pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualizing Class Specific Heterogeneous Tendencies in Categorical Data // Performing multiple-class cluster correspondence analysis(MCCCA). The main functions are create.MCCCAdata() to create a list to be applied to MCCCA, MCCCA() to apply MCCCA, and plot.mccca() for visualizing MCCCA result. Methods used in the package refers to Mariko Takagishi and Michel van de Velden (2022)doi:10.1080/10618600.2022.2035737.
